verses.verse: After <S%H310><s%> these <S%H428><s%> events <S%H1697><s%> King <S%H4428><s%> Ahasuerus <S%H325><s%> promoted <S%H1431><s%> Haman, <S%H2001><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hammedatha <S%H9097><s%> the Agagite, <S%H91><s%> and advanced <S%H5375><s%> him and established <S%H7760><s%> his authority <S%H3678><s%> over <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the princes <S%H8269><s%> who <S%H834><s%> [were] with him.

But Mordecai <S%H4782><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> bowed <S%H3766><s%> down <S%H3766><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> paid <S%H7812><s%> homage. <S%H7812><s%>

Then the king's servants <S%H5650><s%> who <S%H834><s%> were at the king's gate <S%H8179><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Mordecai, <S%H4782><s%> "Why <S%H4069><s%> are you transgressing <S%H5674><s%> the king's command <S%H4687><s%>?"

Now it was when they had spoken <S%H559><s%> daily <S%H3117><s%> to him and he would not listen <S%H8085><s%> to them, that they told <S%H5046><s%> Haman <S%H2001><s%> to see <S%H7200><s%> whether Mordecai's reason <S%H1697><s%> would stand; <S%H5975><s%> for he had told <S%H5046><s%> them that he was a Jew. <S%H3064><s%>

When Haman <S%H2001><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that Mordecai <S%H4782><s%> neither <S%H369><s%> bowed <S%H3766><s%> down <S%H3766><s%> nor <S%H369><s%> paid <S%H7812><s%> homage <S%H7812><s%> to him, Haman <S%H2001><s%> was filled <S%H4390><s%> with rage. <S%H2534><s%>

But he disdained <S%H959><s%> <S%H5869><s%> to lay <S%H7971><s%> hands <S%H3027><s%> on Mordecai <S%H4782><s%> alone, <S%H905><s%> for they had told <S%H5046><s%> him [who <S%H834><s%>] the people <S%H5971><s%> of Mordecai <S%H4782><s%> [were;] therefore Haman <S%H2001><s%> sought <S%H1245><s%> to destroy <S%H8045><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the Jews, <S%H3064><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> of Mordecai, <S%H4782><s%> who [were] throughout the whole <S%H3605><s%> kingdom <S%H4438><s%> of Ahasuerus. <S%H325><s%>

In the first <S%H7223><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> which <S%H1931><s%> is the month <S%H2320><s%> Nisan, <S%H5212><s%> in the twelfth <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of King <S%H4428><s%> Ahasuerus, <S%H325><s%> Pur, <S%H6332><s%> that is the lot, <S%H1486><s%> was cast <S%H5307><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Haman <S%H2001><s%> from day <S%H3117><s%> to day <S%H3117><s%> and from month <S%H2320><s%> [to month <S%H2320><s%>] until the twelfth <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> that is the month Adar. <S%H143><s%>

Then Haman <S%H2001><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to King <S%H4428><s%> Ahasuerus, <S%H325><s%> "There <S%H3426><s%> is a certain <S%H259><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> scattered <S%H6340><s%> and dispersed <S%H6504><s%> among <S%H996><s%> the peoples <S%H5971><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> the provinces <S%H4082><s%> of your kingdom; <S%H4438><s%> their laws <S%H1881><s%> are different <S%H8132><s%> from [those] of all <S%H3605><s%> [other] people, <S%H5971><s%> and they do not observe <S%H6213><s%> the king's laws, <S%H1881><s%> so it is not in the king's interest <S%H9586><s%> to let them remain. <S%H5117><s%>

"If <S%H518><s%> it is pleasing <S%H2895><s%> to the king, <S%H4428><s%> let it be decreed <S%H3789><s%> that they be destroyed, and I will pay <S%H6><s%> ten <S%H8254><s%> thousand <S%H6235><s%> talents <S%H505><s%> of silver <S%H3603><s%> into the hands <S%H3701><s%> of those who carry <S%H3027><s%> on the [king's] business, <S%H6213><s%> to put <S%H4399><s%> into the king's treasuries. <S%H935><s%>"

Then the king <S%H4428><s%> took <S%H5493><s%> his signet <S%H2885><s%> ring <S%H2885><s%> from his hand <S%H3027><s%> and gave <S%H5414><s%> it to Haman, <S%H2001><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hammedatha <S%H9097><s%> the Agagite, <S%H91><s%> the enemy <S%H6887><s%> of the Jews. <S%H3064><s%>

And the king <S%H4428><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Haman, <S%H2001><s%> "The silver <S%H3701><s%> is yours, <S%H5414><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> [also,] to do <S%H6213><s%> with them as you please. <S%H2896><s%> <S%H5869><s%>"

Then the king <S%H4428><s%>'s scribes <S%H9373><s%> were summoned <S%H7121><s%> on the thirteenth <S%H7969><s%> <S%H6240><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the first <S%H7223><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> and it was written <S%H3789><s%> just <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> as Haman <S%H2001><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> to the king's satraps, <S%H323><s%> to the governors <S%H6346><s%> who <S%H834><s%> were over <S%H5921><s%> each <S%H4082><s%> province, <S%H4082><s%> and to the princes <S%H8269><s%> of each <S%H5971><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> each <S%H4082><s%> province <S%H4082><s%> according to its script, <S%H3791><s%> each <S%H5971><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> according to its language, <S%H3956><s%> being written <S%H3789><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of King Ahasuerus <S%H325><s%> and sealed <S%H2856><s%> with the king's signet <S%H2885><s%> ring. <S%H2885><s%>

And letters <S%H5612><s%> were sent <S%H7971><s%> by couriers <S%H7323><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> the king's provinces <S%H4082><s%> to destroy, <S%H8045><s%> to kill, <S%H2026><s%> and to annihilate all <S%H6><s%> the Jews, <S%H3605><s%> both <S%H3064><s%> young <S%H4480><s%> and old, <S%H5288><s%> women <S%H2205><s%> and children, <S%H802><s%> in one <S%H2945><s%> day, <S%H259><s%> the thirteenth <S%H3117><s%> <S%H7969><s%> [day] of the twelfth <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8147><s%> month, <S%H6240><s%> which <S%H2320><s%> is the month <S%H1931><s%> Adar, <S%H2320><s%> and to seize <S%H143><s%> their possessions <S%H962><s%> as plunder. <S%H7998><s%>

A copy <S%H6572><s%> of the edict <S%H3791><s%> to be issued <S%H5414><s%> as law <S%H1881><s%> in every <S%H3605><s%> province <S%H4082><s%> was published <S%H1540><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> the peoples <S%H5971><s%> so that they should be ready <S%H6264><s%> for this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

The couriers <S%H7323><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> out impelled <S%H1765><s%> by the king <S%H4428><s%>'s command <S%H1697><s%> while the decree <S%H1881><s%> was issued <S%H5414><s%> in Susa <S%H7800><s%> the capital; <S%H1002><s%> and while the king and Haman <S%H2001><s%> sat <S%H3427><s%> down <S%H3427><s%> to drink, <S%H8354><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> of Susa <S%H7800><s%> was in confusion. <S%H943><s%>
